QuestData.Title: The Call of Thunder
QuestData.Description: Within the graveyard, in the deepest ruins of their western crypt, the Thunder King's most powerful sorcerers are charging a lightning rod with crackling electricity.$B$BWe suspect that this weapon is meant to rain destruction on our stronghold at Dawnseeker Promontory.$B$BThere is no time to delay. You must stop their ritual at once.
